Reviews.Title: “San Marina Motel”
Reviews.Author: kirsten f
Reviews.Content: I came to Daytona Beach for vacation a week ago and stayed at the San Marina Motel on Atlantic Ave. Other than the cheap pricing and the somewhat cleanliness of the room, my experience was terrible. The guy at the front desk was not polite at all. I had left my room to do some shopping and upon returning I had been locked out of my room because someone apparently was knocking on my door when I was gone. I had not seen anything out of ordinary before I left and was not notified that someone had been knocking on my door that afternoon. I was highly upset when the man at the front desk said it was because of this happening and I was not aware of this situation whatsoever. Later on that night I was sitting outside on the balcony and two suspicious men were walking through the parking lot. They proceeded to go to a girls car that was staying in the room next to me and slash all four of her tires and pour sugar in her gas tank. This was unbelievable to me for they did it only 3 feet away from where I was sitting. The guy from the front desk came out, saw it, and did absolutly nothing. He saw me sitting outside still and didn't bother to ask if I was ok, what I had seen, alert the girl whos car it was, or even call the police. The next day come to find out the girl had said it was a "bad drug deal". Long story short the people in the motel are the number one problem and the man at the front desk including. When I told him that I felt unsafe to stay any longer he would not do a single thing for me, even though I am a 20 year old girl 1500 miles away from home. This was by far the worst hotel experience of my life and I would never reccomened this place to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Great room for the value”
Reviews.Author: swestberry
Reviews.Content: We have stayed there three times now. The s staff is super friendly and the rooms are clean. Can't beat the price and the location. Will stay there every trip we take. The staff has always been helpful and the pool is very clean. Would recommend to anyone going to Daytona on a budget

Reviews.Title: “location about the only thing worthwhile for this motel”
Reviews.Author: CanCruiser
Reviews.Content: We chose this hotel as the price seemed like a good deal, given it is right accross the street from an entrance to the beach. It is obvious that management has cut many corners to make this a value motel while trying to pass it off as a nice 'resort', but we would probably have been just as happy with one of the many dumpy motels who offer more for less. If you want a comfortable stay on or near the beach, I suggest you shell out more money and get a room in the hotel right on the beach. We also chose this hotel for their wi-fi but were dissapointed to learn that their signal was very weak and spent much of our time trying to find the best signal. The rooms themselves were passibly clean, but extremely cramped. It was difficult to navigate around the bed and had to pass the luggage over the bed - very inconvenient. The bathroom was dated, but at least it worked and was clean. All rooms face the pool, and the pool was busy and noisy. At one point it seemed that some kids from outside the hotel snuck into the pool, so it didn't feel very secure. Also note that parking is around the back of the motel, which is not very secure either. Don't expect coffee machines in your rooms, nor is there any coffee available in the office. When we inquired about this, we were informed that you can purchase coffee at the corner store accross the street. This was an added dissapointment. The only thing positive I have to say about it is that the motel is steps away from an entrance to the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Bed Bugs!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Gerald B
Reviews.Content: Each summer for the past 3 years I have stayed in this motel. I liked the price and rooms until a few weeks ago. I will never stay there again! Bed bugs were so bad that I vacated my room at 3:30AM. I couldn't figure out why I was itching badly--and having a fairly severe allergic reaction that began to affect my breathing--until I saw a large bed bug on my sheet (i.e., the size of a large tick but bigger head and eyes, only six legs instead of eight, and faster moving than a tick). The large ones got away, but I caught a few juveniles (much smaller but still blood suckers) and gave them to the night clerk. (From personal [problems in the past] and professional [professor of biology] experiences with bed bugs, I am 100% certain that I am not mistaken.) After demanding my money back, I slept in my car for the rest of the night. Before getting home to PA, I had to fumigate my suitcase and car to prevent carrying bed bugs into my house. The 20+ welts on my body, from bites, lasted nearly a week. Worst motel experience of my life! I stand behind this review! The owners and desk clerk should know exactly who I am. As a reminder, I rented room #104 on Aug 2, 2012. If this escalates, I will sue for pain and suffering!

Reviews.Title: “OK....For the price”
Reviews.Author: Cheryl02760
Reviews.Content: This motel was OK for the price. I'd stay here again for as much as your in the room when at the beach. The room was very clean but, mosquito's came in under the door because of the gap under it, we had to put a towel there to keep them out. Parking is not the greatest, it is on the side, so you need to pull in front to unload then back your car out on a busy highway. You do have to pay for ice, which I think sucks, but if you need it, you need it! The guy at the front was nice, but at checkout was not there to get my receipt, had to drop key through the window. Will add photo's later as soon as I get them uploaded.

Reviews.Title: “sucksssssss”
Reviews.Author: Seria B
Reviews.Content: please do not go to this hotel it is the worst I ever been to. The room smelled like a loud bleach. You have to pay for ice plus when we asked for a bucket to get ice in the hotel owners told tthere son to give us a plastic bag i mean really. This place looks like a beat up trailer park that was built 1000 years ago the only good quality is that it was right across from beach. That is the only good thing trust me please never go here

Reviews.Title: “Wtf”
Reviews.Author: B O
Reviews.Content: When we pulled into the motel parking lot it looked like a rundown area i still gave it the benefit of the doubt as we talked to the motel staff they were nothing but rude the pictures are not what they seem to be everything looks tacky like they built it in 5 mins walk into the rooms did not see anything that was to nasty until the sheets were uncovered stains on the sheets pillows as well as on the shower curtain i will never stay here again especially with the stupid gang bangers standing out side smoking weed and doing drugs when ya lock the doors thinking its safe being inside at night and no worries can come you find out the windows dont lock im talking about big windows with no locks if your a dirty person and are a big drug fan i recommend this motel to you oh and theirs not room to walk or move at all in the rooms i could litterely kick some one in the face by laying on the bed if the entered through the door or window

Reviews.Title: “Poor service, average hotel. Yes it's cheap but not worth it.”
Reviews.Author: HEB23
Reviews.Content: Chose this hotel as pictures looked rather nice and description stated it was close to the beach. Rooms are less than average, and the hotel is at least a block from the beach. Woke up to people screaming by our door. Area where hotel is at is also rather scary at night.

Reviews.Title: “No Value, No Respect... Horrible, horrible liars”
Reviews.Author: Gabriel P
Reviews.Content: I booked a room 2 months ago, they would not charge me for it immediately.. They said they would charge two weeks before reservation.. 19 days before the reservation, they tried to run the charge.. It was declined, so the immediately cancelled reservation and refused to reinstate this.. When I called, they said they tried to run my card the day I made the reservation. This may fly back in their country, but is horrible service, and a pathetic way to operate a business in this country.. And they are nohing but liars and slobs.. Horrible conditions at the hotel.. I wouldnt ask a crackhead to stay there if it was the last lodging establishment left..

Reviews.Title: “Very basic accomodation.”
Reviews.Author: travellingman1352
Reviews.Content: We needed a one night lay over and read the varying reviews on this motel and decided to see for ourselves. From the outside the motel is not impressive. We booked a non-smoking room but were given a smoking room. On our request this was changed to a reasonably comfortable room. The room was clean and basic. There was no telephone in the room but it was equipped with a amicrowave and a small refrigerator. The sheets on the bed were clean but the fitted sheet was too small for the mattress and pulled away at the corners. The bathroom was clean but the drain in the bath was partially blocked and backed up. The towels were worn and scrappy looking. We had towels with us and used ours instead. We got a fair price on this motel and are not complaining. With a little more attention and effort it can be improved.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice & Friendly”
Reviews.Author: Harry0120
Reviews.Content: we recently have stayed at the motel on 1/20/12 & we have checked these reviews of the motel after we made the reservation. we were afraid that we were going in hell but it turn out good. Nice comfy rooms, everything was clean, rooms were little small but it was clean. Bathroom was very nice. I wish their pool would be heated, The room had fridge, microwave,tv,hair dryer, Wifi, i had to go to the office to ask for a iron and iron board because they don't have it in the room & main thing is for $35.00 a night what could you ask for more. Location was very good across the street from the beach and i was close to everything shopping, night life, dining,boardwalk... I would stay with my family next time when i go there.

Reviews.Title: “Negative 5 star”
Reviews.Author: Mandi V
Reviews.Content: This motel is gross. All the pictures we had seen online are NOT what the rooms look like. There is no phone in the room and our smoke detector was missing. The bathroom door and the inside of the exterior door had black dirt on them that could have easily been wiped down by the cleaning staff. The towels smelled dirty and did not look clean. There was a piece of gum on top of the tile in the shower. There is one mirror in the entire room and it's in the bathroom which makes it a little hard for 2 people to get ready at the same time. The fridge is so close to the bed that you can't walk between the 2 unless you move the bed. This place charges $170-$200 per night during bike week and $80 on normal nights, we got a special of $38 since it was a last minute booking and I wouldn't pay $2 to stay there ever again. The staff was not nice or helpful in any way

Reviews.Title: “Pretty much made us write off Daytona”
Reviews.Author: floridalibn
Reviews.Content: Usually if TA reviews are mixed, I'll take a chance, because our family isn't really hard to please. Unfortunately, this totally backfired on me this time! We all hated this motel; I'll try to enumerate the reasons why. 1) Parking/office. When we arrived, it was hard to tell where the office was, and driving around the parking lot made it clear that the parking would not be convenient to the rooms. We finally parked and walked around until we found the office. 2) The person at the desk was rude & unpleasant during checkin. You would think they would be happy to have customers. We had 2 rooms, but they didn't even bother to give us adjacent rooms. 3) Dead cockroach outside door, left for several days. Ugh. 4) The rooms were nasty. No chairs; only place to sit was on the bed. Barely enough room to walk around the beds. Fridge & microwave, but no coffeemaker!!!! No do-not-disturb signs, no shampoo. Entry was via keys and doors did not automatically lock behind us. Due to the nature of the people staying at and hanging out around this very cheap motel, I did not feel safe. 5) Not soundproof. And the people staying there (did not see any besides us without tatoos or with all their teeth, not to be judgmental...) were loud and rude (roaring up into the courtyard on their Harleys at all hours), which would have been ok had there been any soundproofing whatsoever in the rooms. 6) Pool area: 2 umbrellas and about 7 plastic lounge chairs; one plastic table. 7) Housekeeping. This is the beach. There was some sand on my floor from my sandals; they didn't even bother to try to vacuum. We paid in advance for 3 nights; two was all we could stand. The best part of this vacation was coming home!

Reviews.Title: “Most horrible experience ever!!!”
Reviews.Author: alexandrathegreat1
Reviews.Content: They advertised the rooms being $35 but it ended up costing $55 for a night. When we entered the room it was cramped and smelled old. There was no shampoo or lotion, no remote control or a phone. There were only two towels and when we went to ask for more the lady manager said that there were only two per room and she said it was not her problem. Also the key that they gave me for the room jammed in the door and we had to get someone to fix it. The sheets were not clean, stained and had burn holes in them. When I asked for a refund so that I could go to another hotel after two hours they showed me the fine print on the receipt that stated no refund. Check out time was at ten o'clock very early and I asked for a late checkout at ten thirty she said yes. The management was very rude and unfriendly. Ten o'clock rolls around and they knocked on the door saying that we either needed to pay for another room or leave or they were calling the police. I preceded to pack my bags and leave and told him so although he was already on the phone with the police saying that we refused to leave although I never said that. the point is no one should ever stay at this hotel. I was appalled by their terrible customer service and I would never go back.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, great deal, fabulous location”
Reviews.Author: TeacherSarahinFl
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I stayed here for a weekend getaway. I was a little nervous due to the previous reviews, but was pleasantly surprised when entering the room. It was clean and had a microwave and mini fridge. The television worked just fine as well. The pool is also huge and looked very clean. The hotel is directly across from public beach access. The only two complaints I have is no shampoo in the shower and the walk to Sea Breeze for the night clubs was a bit far in heels..but both ways we had cabs stop and give us a five dollar ride right away.

Reviews.Title: “No problems, great for price! Not sure where the horror stories are coming from.”
Reviews.Author: Amanda1127
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I got room 207, a non-smoking, king sized bed room at the San Marina for two nights to celebrate my birthday. There were no major problems at all! There were a couple of bugs in the bathroom, but it was nowhere close to an infestation and there are bound to be a few in the summer in Florida. The bed was clean and comfortable and the maintenance staff changed the sheets daily. The bathroom and the room itself were also clean. The picture quality on the TV was bad, which really doesn't matter. The refigerator and microwave both worked well and there was an ice machine onsite so we could bring drinks to the beach. The room decor was hideous, but once again, that really doesn't matter. The absolute best thing about this hotel is the LOCATION! It's right across the street from the beach, walking distance from dining, shopping, nightclubs, bars and the pier. We didn't use the car the entire time we were there. Also, for the price, it's probably unbeatable. I didn't think it was possible to get a room in Daytona during peak season so close to the beach for the price I paid! Overall, I enjoyed my stay at the San Marina and will most likely be back!

Reviews.Title: “Not recommended”
Reviews.Author: sazamarry
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a non-smoking double bed room there for three nights. It was a horrible experience. The room had no window and when we asked the receptionist, she said that is the case for all double bed rooms. The sheets seemed dirty although they were changed daily. The towels had lots of stains on them. The detergent they used had a very strong smell and the receptionists were not nice at all. The only good point was the location which was close to the beach. It was not quite cheap in comparison with the other available options. We could get a better room on Ocean resort walk (across the street) with the same price.

Reviews.Title: “San Marina Roach Motel”
Reviews.Author: kacrmn
Reviews.Content: The place looked nice from the outside when we got there and was across from the beach side which we expected. We got in real early so we decided to let them know we were in town and got our first rude experience from the office. We came back later and got our room which seemed ok when we went in,nothing fancy but seemed clean. A couple of days into our stay we discovered a family of roaches living under the fridge so we reported it to someone in charge when we could find someonre who spoke english. We were never moved to a bug free room and no one treated the roon while we were there. We felt like we were more of an inconvenience than guests . The price would have been great if it was roach free, but not at any price the way it was! Like a brick layer friend of mine once said "Looks good from the road". We wont stay there again or recomend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: marrog22
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I booked at room here for two nights over a weekend and we were so surprised! At 44 dollars a night (for a single, non smoking room), the value of the place was great! The room was newly remodeled and the bathrooms were really nice. Everything was clean and well kept. I would definitely recommend this for a quick stay. You only have to cross the street to the beach, and it's right near one of the beach ramps so that if you want to drive on the beach, that's an option too! The only other thing I would recommend is to bring your own pillows because the hotel only provides one per guest. Other than that this place is great!

Reviews.Title: “Great value, nice clean basic rooms,good location”
Reviews.Author: grouchee1
Reviews.Content: Pleasantly surprised, our room was very clean, recently remodeled. Did not experience the horror stories in previous reviews. Front desk, at check in was very polite and helpful. The room attendants/maid were not overly friendly but did their job, although this is a no frills place, not the Ritz. Reminder that you are not paying for the Ritz either. The owners live on premise with their children and seem to be very nice. The showers are great older high pressure. The beach is just across the street. Great location. You can see the waves from the motel. Great place on a budget. Although if you do not have a cell phone, there were no phones in our room.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Surprised”
Reviews.Author: sightseer23
Reviews.Content: The rooms were clean, recently painted, and the bathroom was newly remodeled. Great location right across the street from the beach and close to the shopping strip! The housekeepers did clean the rooms daily but they did ask if anything was needed. Overall, a good experience! For the money it is as good as it gets! P.S. One of the house keepers does use a stolen shopping cart as a utility cart to clean with!

Reviews.Title: “more than worth the 32 bucks a night I spent”
Reviews.Author: brylo2Wisconsin
Reviews.Content: I can see I am against the grain here! Many rooms are being totally redone...everything including even the drywall is being replaced. I assume all rooms will be redone as a large percentage were being stripped...off season of course. I saw no bugs! I have spent $125 a night in Daytona and was not impressed. That was at the La Quinta which is just a revamped version of the "Budget cabana". In season to be fair. Anyway...room was as clean as any of the places I have been at in Daytona Beach. (La Quinta had mold on shower curtain, this place did not) My room had not been redone but for 32 bucks I had a shower that pushed me across the tub and the pool was clean but of course cold. I think people are missing a big point here. You stay ACROSS the street from the ocean to save money. The Hilton is readily available. I stayed at the "Desert Inn" just south of this place in June...THAT was a dump! Wall was waterlogged and the whole door frame moved as a result when you shut your door!! Disgusting "workout" room... cockroach city down there! Oh...wireless internet too!! Some rooms only but they say that up front.

Reviews.Title: “Pictures on website not what you get in rooms.”
Reviews.Author: dallas7307
Reviews.Content: Very small rooms, roaches everywhere, nasty bathrooms. The pictures they have online are not pictures of the actual rooms you get at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible, Disgusting, Rude!!!”
Reviews.Author: shellcm455
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a single suite, and let me just say there was nothing "suite" about it! The owners are rude. The room smells soooo bad! Our air conditioning was broken and we had to wait for them to replace it. The rooms don't look like what they have posted on the internet, don't let them fool you! The sheets on the bed are just top sheets, so they come off the bed in the night. There is no clock in the room. The bathroom is a joke, the shower is small and so low, if you are over 5'5" your head will hit the ceiling! Laundry area is outside and is dirty, it looks as if it has never been cleaned. Room service was horrible to none. They don't tell you that you have to put down a 50 dollar security deposit. There were nats in our room. It is just a horrible place to stay. The only good thing I can say about this dump is that it is in a great location. There are many other motels along this strip that I would consider you checking out, I don't think it can get any worse than this one. Spend your money somewhere else, they won't let you get your money back in case you are not satisfied. We had to stay a whole week, and was not happy about it. Don' t make the same mistake we did.

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: nursnanc
Reviews.Content: This place was the worst motel I have ever seen!!!!! We unfortunately paid first, then climbed 3 stories to our room. If that is what you call it!!!!! The screens were out, the curtains were ripped and falling down, it stunk. We even looked at 2 other rooms and they were worse!!!!! Refused to give us a refund so we just cut our losses and left. Went down the road to a Super 8 paid $25 more and was right on the ocean. Don't ever go to this dump!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Horrible!!!”
Reviews.Author: deming_misty
Reviews.Content: This place was absolutely horrible!!!! We wanted to leave a day early because of a family emergency. We asked the lady at the front desk if we could skip out early (paid for an entire week up front - NEVER DO THAT!!!) and she told us that it was fine and she would refund us for the days we wouldn't be staying. After we had packed all our stuff, went to the front desk to check out, she told us that they were keeping our money and to get out ASAP other people would be coming in!!!! Talk about cheating students! This place was not only money grabbers but it was also discusting. When the ladies came in to vacuum our room, she vacuumed up my anklet and then pulled it out of their vacuum and left it on the floor all black and discusting. I guess they thought I wouldn't notice? Anyways my advice to all of you, NEVER STAY HERE EVER!! IT STINKS!!

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting Place”
Reviews.Author: kburns
Reviews.Content: As soon as I pulled into the over crowded parking lot I knew I messed up. What a dump. If I thought the outside was bad the inside was worse. As soon I saw my room I handed in my key and left. The smell of the room hit you in the face when you open the door. The toilet still had urine and cigerette buts in it from the previous guest. This in a "non smoking room". The matress was disgusting. I would not let a dog sleep on it. Extremely dirty place.

Reviews.Title: “Hated the San Marina in Daytona Beach”
Reviews.Author: roachmotel
Reviews.Content: The rooms were not as seen on the internet. The King Suite was a full size dirty mattress, no heat, the curtains did not cover the windows, phone did not work, nasty towels and no hand towels, and the only mirror in the room was over the toilet. The other tentants were very loud until 2 or 3 in the morning, a car in the parking lot was broken into to and on the day we were leaving, a man was asleep on the back steps. Of course you had to pay for the entire stay the day you checked in, and if I would have seen the room before we paid, I would have rather slept on the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Seriously Made Me Sick”
Reviews.Author: torontocarp
Reviews.Content: STAY AWAY Looked at this hotel on their website,and it looked amazing. Big Big surprise when we arrived in Daytona beach and physically saw the rooms. As soon as you opened the door a heavy smell of must overcame us fallowed by the strong odour of bleach use to try and cover up the must and mold smell. The matresses on the beds looked as though they were found at a dump site. They were torn,dirty with stains and smelled of must. The bathroom was filthy and covered in black mold on the tile surfaces. The carpets were disgusting and covered in stains. The whole room was not fit for a dog to stay in let alone a human!!! We Told the manager that we were disgusted in nthe way this place was run down and dirty and said we would not be sstaying there ( was during the Daytona 500 race) at $165.00 a night. We were assured that our credit card would not be charged and we left. After returning home it was discovered that the credit card had been charged for the room that same day. This place is disgusting at best and the staff are dishonest. This was a expensive lesson.

HotelInfo.Name: San Marina Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 1001 N. Atlantic Avenue, Daytona Beach, FL 32118
